text:
I'm trying to run the replace task on an 86 MB file and it fails with an
OutOfMemory exception.  I've found the culprit to be in
apache-ant-1.6.5\src\main\org\apache\tools\ant\taskdefs\Replace.java:386  :

            String buf = fileUtils.readFully(br);

Replace should read the file one line at a time and do it's replacement
accordingly.  This might make replace a lot faster as well for the VM won't have
to do as much garbage collection to get entire file in memory.
creator: ryan@thebookhauler.com
